message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $180.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, $180 is a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you the product for $140.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $140 is still a little more than I can afford.  I'm willing to go up to $115. Let's try to make this work.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $115 yet. I'll compromise and offer you the product for $155.
